item.title: MIUI 20.10.30 Recovery update for Mi CC 9 Pro China
item.description:
New Weekly Recovery update available!

Version: 20.10.30 | 11.0

Size: 3.2 GB

MD5: 9815a63413d3d1be9c7cdd54ec2969f7

Changelog:
Bug fixes and system optimizations.

Updated Android Security Patch to August 2020. Increased system security.

item.title: MIUI V12.0.1.0.QFDEUXM Fastboot update for Mi Note 10 / Note 10 Pro EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi Note 10 / Note 10 Pro EEA

Codename: tucana

Version: V12.0.1.0.QFDEUXM | 10.0

Size: 4.7 GB

MD5: 4ceffbea99f0de3e52570492c87dc8b0

Changelog:
[System animations]
Optimization: Animations in selected scenes
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
New: When Notification shade is open, swipe down from the upper right corner to open Control center
Optimization: Control center is now closed by incoming calls
Optimization: Press and hold redirection options
[Dark mode]
Optimization: Brightness and color improvements for wallpapers in Dark mode
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to August 2020. Increased system security.
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Screen lights up with an animation now
New: Status bar color gradient animation
Fix: Notification shade wasn't displayed correctly in Dark mode
[Camera]
New: Movie frame

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.0.2.0.QFDRUXM Fastboot update for Mi Note 10 / Note 10 Pro Russia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi Note 10 / Note 10 Pro Russia

Codename: tucana

Version: V12.0.2.0.QFDRUXM | 10.0

Size: 4.5 GB

MD5: e4bc1b3dbcc099231e7cea8deea6cba4

Changelog:
[System animations]
Optimization: Animations in selected scenes
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
New: When Notification shade is open, swipe down from the upper right corner to open Control center
Optimization: Control center is now closed by incoming calls
Optimization: Press and hold redirection options
Fix: Control center wasn't always displayed correctly in landscape mode
[Dark mode]
Optimization: Brightness and color improvements for wallpapers in Dark mode
[System]
Optimization: Full screen gestures are now ignored on the Lock screen alarm page
Fix: Home screen went black and started flashing after unlocking in some cases
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Screen lights up with an animation now
New: Status bar color gradient animation
Fix: Notification shade wasn't displayed correctly in Dark mode

Download: Here
